A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Characters are flat\, undeveloped and uninteresting.
The previously set up storylines and characters are left unexplained\, handwaved or outright ruined by flip-flopping on the tone\, background and motivations.
Without getting into technicalities of science\, in this science fiction-flavored fantasy movie. It defeats and disassembles previously set up "science" facts about its universe and makes no sense what so ever.

Save your money\, don't go watch it\, better yet\, don't watch it on DVD either and save your time as well. If you absolutely have to see it\, wait until there's a decent quality torrent upload and pirate it.
